content:
I'm organizing a movie night with my family and friends. I need suggestions for movies similar to the one with the title ID 90068472. Could you provide me with a list of similar titles along with their availability, contextual synopsis, and genres? Limit the response to 25 titles.
Begin!

To accomplish this request, I will first query the system for similar movies using the provided ID 90068472 and limit the suggestions to 25 titles. Then, I will extract information like contextual synopsis, genre, and availability using another call for movie details.

First, I'll use the subordinate "title_similars_for_netflix_data" function to get similar titles to the requested movie.

The response indicates that there are no similar titles found for the movie with the title ID 90068472, meaning we currently have no similar movie suggestions to provide.

Given the result, I will conclude the task by reporting this status.
I will now call "Finish" and convey that I do not have relevant suggestions available based on the given title ID.

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"Unfortunately, I couldn't find any similar movies to the title with ID 90068472 for your movie night. Please check if the title ID is correct or try with a different movie."}
